SEARCH
Package com.mimecast.robin.scanners.rbl

Class RblResult

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.scanners.rbl.RblResult
public class RblResult extends Object
Result of an RBL check.

This class represents the result of checking an IP address against a single RBL provider. It includes information about whether the IP is listed, the RBL provider used, and any response records returned by the RBL lookup.
